name: HOLIDAYS
description:
In this RPG, you awake to find a dog on your bed. You then go on an adventure to bring it back home!

Features:

    - An original story where you won’t know where it’s going! I made the basis for this story and it’s worlds on two pieces of papers while in class over 9 years ago!
    - Created by one person except for the music!
    - Original art and music within.
    - Funny jokes and stuff. I’m sure it’ll make you laugh at least once!
    - On screen encounters.
    - Hug your way to victory!

You need to know!

Because of a certain script that I use, the game will most likely drop frames in twilight town when an enemy has it's sights on you. I'm sorry but I needed this script and it was a learning experience for me. I'm sorry again.


This is also a short game that should take approx 3 hours to finish. Take it as a one off game as it will be a while before I get back to making the other parts. Take this game as a piece of art that you can enjoy and experience and most importantly, have fun!
